name: Wholesale Pricing for WooCommerce
author: Vark

sections.description:
Power your store to greater success with wholesale pricing and sales promotions! Just about any type of wholesale pricing or sales promotion you can think of, Wholesale Pricing for WooCommerce is your one-stop shop to accomplish it.

FULLY TESTED with

  • WordPress 5.9+
  • Gutenberg
  • WooCommerce 5.6+
  • PHP 7.2+

What can you do with Wholesale Pricing?

  • Wholesale Discount pricing
  • Catalog Sale Product and Variation Discount Pricing
  • Schedulable

The Details

Wholesale Pricing can

  • Wholesale Catalog Pricing

    • Show the discount in the catalog pricing., by Logged-in Role (Wholesaler, Membership), Category, and others.

  • Group Sale Pricing

    • Use a single rule to put an entire Category (or other group) on sale. Just like having a sale price on a product, except
    • a single rule can apply to a big group, without updating each product individually!!!

  • *This plugin is the baby brother of * Pricing Deals for WooCommerce

** With the Wholesale Pricing plugin all of these actions can be applied and managed in one place, and requires no product database updates! **

Visit the Documentation

The free version gives you:

  • Catalog Pricing options for the whole store
  • Begin date / End date scheduling
  • Audit Trail log of purchases made with Wholesale Pricing Rule discounts

The Pro version gives you incredible control over rule groups – by category, product and more!

The Pro version also gives you: (group power!)

  • The Pro version gives you group power – the additional flexibility of applying Sales and Promotions to:
    • Whole Store, Wholesaler or Membership or Role (Display different prices for logged in users), Product Category and Wholesale Pricing custom Category, Product or Variation

Vist the Pro Version

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WooCommerce 2.0.14+
  • WordPress 3.3+
  • PHP 5+

Install Instructions

  1. Upload the folder wholesale-pricing-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your site
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
